data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Lohit, Arunachal Pradesh, India that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Lohit, Arunachal Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the county of Lohit prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 142,329 lost people in  Lohit, Arunachal Pradesh, India have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 1,603 believers in Lohit, Arunachal Pradesh, India a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Meitei Bishnupriya people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Spirit, encourage the disciples in Lohit, Arunachal Pradesh, India to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Lohit, Arunachal Pradesh, India that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the county of Lohit, Arunachal Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

location.name: Lohit
location.people_groups_list: Kachari Sonwal, Bhotia Tibetan, Ahom, Bilaspuri, Hill Miri
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Kachari Sonwal (278,000), Bhotia Tibetan (3,300), Ahom (1,332,000), Bilaspuri (1,100), Hill Miri (200)
